column3: Latest;Kratie:  A female river ------dolphin------ was found dead in Sambok commune
column7: according to WWF-Cambodia.------The dolphin research team found that the dead dolphin weighed 110 kilograms and had a length of 227 cm. The death was caused after it got trapped in illegal fishing nets. ------SWIFT NEWS------EDIT:  Kang Ratana
column8: director of the Kratie provincial tourism department
column9: said that the net around the the dolphin’s tail was probably drifting in the river
column10: and added that locals also had a lot of knowledge about conservation
column11: so they do not put their nets in areas where dolphins still live.------ KBN
